dcterms:description: The KimiaPath24 dataset contains 24 whole slide images (WSIs) showing diverse organs and tissue types with different texture patterns. It includes 1325 test images (patches) of size 1000 × 1000 pixels, which were down-sampled to 250 × 250 pixels for processing.
dcterms:title: KimiaPath24
